title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1317/98 of 25 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1317/98 of 25 June 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 are hereby replaced by the Annexes to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 June 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 20, 27. 1. 1998, p. 16.
(3) OJ L 161, 23. 6. 1976, p. 10.
(4) OJ L 170, 28. 6. 1997, p. 26.
